pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 12, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 12, 2016:

Ottawa

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of New Brunswick, Brian Gallant.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Prime Ministerâ€™s Awards for Teaching Excellence and for Excellence in Early Childhood Education, and will present 15 awards to teachers and early childhood educators.

Canadian Museum of Nature
240 McLeod Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.


PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
